name: MentalOrBehavioralServicesDeclinedSNOMED
title: Mental or Behavioral Services Declined (SNOMED)
description: The value set contains SNOMEDCT concepts for declining mental or behavioral health services.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The value set contains SNOMEDCT concepts for declining mental or behavioral health services.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people who have declined a referral to mental or behavioral health services. This element may map to "Intervention" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes declining  general mental or behavioral health services.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes declining mental or behavioral health services for specific conditions, i.e., referral for depression, or for services that treat specific conditions, i.e., referral to addiction services.)

contains.display: Referral to psychiatrist declined by subject (situation)
